name: Blood Alloy
blurb: Unseat the horrifically oppressive robo-government of the future as you uncover the truth behind your past in this indie Metroidvania!

rewards.reward: Every bit helps.  You'll have our profound gratitude. And we're pretty sure the evil cybernetic armies of the future will bitterly curse your name.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: The Game: 
============================= 
Save $5 off of the $15 tier!
A DRM-free copy of Blood Alloy upon release.
The Game:\r\n==============================  A DRM-free copy of Blood Alloy upon release.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: The Digital Bundle: \r\n=============================  Save $5 off the $30 tier!  A DRM-free copy of Blood Alloy upon release, a digital copy of the soundtrack, and a digital artbook filled with concept art and pixel art sprites.  Receive a Thank You in the game's credits with your name listed.

The Digital Bundle: ==============================  A DRM-free copy of Blood Alloy upon release, a digital copy of the soundtrack, and a digital artbook filled with concept art and pixel art sprites.  Receive a Thank You in the game's credits.

Closed Beta + The Complete Bundle: ============================= \r\nClosed Beta access to our game, access to our forums, and our ears as we eagerly listen to your feedback.  Help us fine-tune the game to make it the most fun it can possibly be.  Also includes DRM-free copy of the game upon release, digital soundtrack, digital artbook, and a Thank You in the credits.

Limited Edition Package: ============================= Get a signed and numbered Limited-Edition 11"x17" glossy cardstock Blood Alloy poster.  This will be the only print run of this poster design.  Gain Closed Beta access to our game, access to our forums, and our ears as we eagerly listen to your feedback. Help us fine-tune the game to make it the most fun it can possibly be. Also includes DRM-free copy of the game upon release, digital soundtrack, digital artbook, and a Thank You in the credits.  Shipping for the poster not included for non-U.S. residents.

QA Training + Limited Edition Package: ============================= \r\nGet trained to break into the game industry with game testing!  Along with getting access to the game's beta, you will receive a 1.5 hour long training on how to log industry-standard bug reports with Frank over Skype video.  Also includes a DRM-free copy of the game, the digital soundtrack, the digital artbook, the Limited Edition poster, and your name listed as a "Kickstarter Tester" in the credits.  Shipping for the poster not included for non-US residents.

Pixel Portrait + Limited Edition Package: =============================  Submit a photo of yourself unto us and Kahlief will generate and send you a pixel-sprite rendition of your likeness!  Also includes a DRM-free copy of the game, the digital soundtrack, the digital artbook, and the Limited Edition poster.  Shipping for the poster not included for non-US residents.

Art Training + Limited Edition Package: =============================  \r\nReceive a 1.5 hour training session by pixel artist Kahlief Steele on topic of pixel art techniques of your own choosing.  Also includes a DRM-free copy of the game, the digital soundtrack, the digital artbook, the Limited Edition poster, and your name listed as a "Kickstarter Pixel Artist" in the credits. Shipping for the poster not included for non-US residents.

Weapon Creation + Limited Edition Package: =============================  \r\nWork with us to create and design your own weapon to be featured in the game.  Also includes a DRM-free copy of the game, the digital soundtrack, the digital artbook, the Limited Edition poster, and your name listed as a "Kickstarter Weapon Creator" in the credits.  Designs subject to approval. Shipping for the poster not included for non-US residents.

Enemy Creation + Limited Edition Package: =============================  \r\nWork with us to create and design your own enemy to be featured in the game.  Also includes a DRM-free copy of the game, the digital soundtrack, the digital artbook, the Limited Edition poster, and your name listed as a "Kickstarter Enemy Creator" in the credits.  Designs subject to approval. Shipping for the poster not included for non-US residents.

Mini-Boss Creation + Limited Edition Package: ============================= \r\nWork with us to create and design your own mini-boss to be featured in the game.  Also includes a DRM-free copy of the game, the digital soundtrack, the digital artbook, the Limited Edition poster, and your name listed as a "Kickstarter Mini-Boss Creator" in the credits.  Designs subject to approval. Shipping for the poster not included for non-US residents.
